mapper.select: SELECT budget, weight, size, os, `as`, battery, twoinone, macbook, highhz, highresolution FROM t_question WHERE iuser = #{iuser}

SELECT required_cpu AS requiredCpu, required_gpu AS requiredGpu, required_ram AS requiredRam, IF(is_mac_sup = 'Y', true, false) AS supportMac FROM t_program WHERE iprogram IN
#{item}

SELECT A.ram, A.size, A.weight, A.brand, A.os, A.battery, A.istwoinone, A.hz, A.resolution, ROUND(B.price * (1 - B.dc_rate), -3) AS price, C.performance AS cpuPerformance, D.performance AS gpuPerformance, B.img AS detailImg, A.nm, A.product_code, C.nm AS cpuNm, D.nm AS gpuNm, B.price AS originalPrice, B.idetail, A.iproduct, D.is_inner_gpu FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_cpu C ON A.icpu = C.icpu INNER JOIN t_product_gpu D ON A.igpu = D.igpu WHERE B.isrep = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(iuser) AS result FROM t_fav_mapping GROUP BY iproduct HAVING iproduct = #{iproduct}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(rating), 1) AS resultFloat FROM t_product_review GROUP BY iproduct HAVING iproduct = #{iproduct}
